dialogue: Spirit began flying towards Planet Molotov.
Hmm...this shouldn't be too long of a trip.
I think I can make it in a day.
But suddenly, space bullets whizzed past Spirit's vehicle.
A fleet of fighter crafts were flanking Spirit's ship.
Spirit continued avoiding the bulletfire as best as possible,
but she couldn't avoid them all.
Bullets ripped holes into her ship and damaged it
so severely that Spirit lost control of it completely.
With no say left, she began falling towards the nearest planet.
